category.name: Data Sharing.STEP Translator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: STEP_not_yet_approved_status
preference.preference_description: Supports only STEP AP214. Sets the item type as not yet approved. Use this preference to import not yet approved STEP data into Teamcenter as working data. Do this by defining a list of strings that, when detected during import, denote not yet approved status. Valid Values: One or more strings.
